job.title: Open Source Intelligence Analyst
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: strongJob Number R0113038brbrstrongOpen Source Intelligence AnalystbrbrstronguThe ChallengebrbrustrongCritical decisions are made every single day in our government and military What if you could use your analytical skills to help them make informed decisions With all the information available today it takes a skilled analyst to know how to find and interpret the best data to give their clients the right answers As an OSINT analyst you use your specialized language skills regional and functional knowledge and your client engagement skills to develop cutting edge research and analysis methods intelligence products and analytic assessments to give your client the actionable skills to support our warfighters protect our national security and inform our nations leadersbrbrAs an OSINT analyst on our team youll help your client understand mission environment Using your understanding of various collection and analyst platforms youll explore new data sources build effective queries and combine information from disparate sources Youll validate information and apply client tradecraft as you contribute to assessments for senior policymakers As the authority on your functional and regional area your client will look to you for timely critical recommendations often under pressure This is a chance to grow your expertise develop new skills in OSINT and advanced analytics and share your methodologies with other analysts We focus on growing as a team to deliver the best support to our customers so youll have resources for mentoring and learning new skills and tools Join us as we provide the right information at the right time to support the critical needs of our warfighters nations leaders and policy makersbrbrEmpower change with usbrbrstronguYou Havebrustrongulli3 years of experience with open source systems tradecraft and methodologies to conduct research collection or analysisliliKnowledge of advanced internetbased research including Boolean logic advanced research techniques search engine and databasebrliulresources and resource validationbrulliActive TSSCI clearanceliliBA or BS degree in International Relations or Security StudiesbrliulstronguNice If You HavebrustrongulliExperience as a strategic allsource analyst data scientist or research assistantliliExperience with collaborating in multifunctional analytic teamsliliMA or MS degreeliliOSINT CertificationbrliulstronguClearancebrbrustrongApplicants selected will be subject to a security investigation and may need to meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information TSSCI clearance is requiredbrbrstronguBuild Your CareerbrbrustrongAt Booz Allen we know the power of analytics and intelligence When you join Booz Allen well help you develop the career you wantbrbrstrongChallenging projectsstrong  Whether training analysts on military equipment through VR technology developing a simulation capability to allow teams to rehearse missions together or integrating RFID tags into mobile devices to enable data access within a geo parameter youll get to solve some of the worlds toughest problemsbrbrstrongMeaningful workstrong  Use your skills to empower change Your work will keep citizens and warfighters safe and well both at home and abroadbrbrstrongStateoftheart technologystrong  Broaden your intelligence capabilities with digital forensics telematics precision navigation secure mobile operations and advanced analyticsbrbrstrongNew skillsstrong  Inhouse experts and partnerships with tech leaders like Nvidia and Splunk mean you can get practical experience with advanced GPU technologies cyber security and data sciencebrbrstrongRoom to growstrong  Youll be inspired to grow your career while making your ideas a reality thanks
